channel.title: Privacy Policy on Aporime Technologies
channel.description: Recent content in Privacy Policy on Aporime Technologies

item.title: Metro Sudoku Privacy Policy
item.description: Privacy Policy Aporime Technologies Inc built the Metro Sudoku app as a Free app. This SERVICE is provided by Aporime Technologies Inc at no cost and is intended for use as is. This page is used to inform visitors regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Service. If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy.
